p: Recently in China, probably in October 2019, a new type of illness caused by a new strain of the coronavirus, the SARS-CoV-2 (Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2) emerged in Wuhan city. The new illness present respiratory symptoms similar to the other two syndromes mentioned above, but the virus is closely related to SARS (82 % similarity to SARS-CoV virus) than to MERS and shows high pathogenicity in humans [ [8], [9], [10]].
